articles.description: Follow action from eight games on Boxing Day in the Premier League including Man City v Everton, Chelsea v Fulham, Wolves v Man Utd and Liverpool v Leicester.
articles.title: Premier League: Eight games including Man City v Everton, Chelsea v Fulham, Wolves v Man Utd, Liverpool v Leicester - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Nottingham Forest vs Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League
articles.title: Nottingham Forest vs Tottenham Hotspur: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Erling Haaland has a second-half penalty saved by Jordan Pickford as Manchester City's crisis continues with a laboured Premier League draw against Everton.
articles.title: Manchester City 1-1 Everton: Erling Haaland has penalty saved in draw

articles.description: India's Virat Kohli is fined 20% of his match fee after barging into Australia opener Sam Konstas on day one of the fourth Test in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Virat Kohli fined for barging Sam Konstas in Melbourne Test

articles.description: Watch or listen to Open All Mics, follow commentary from Celtic Park plus live text updates as eight Scottish Premiership teams are in action.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership live coverage, stats & head-to-head

articles.title: Championship LIVE: 12 matches on Boxing Day with all teams in action

articles.description: LeBron James claims a history-making Christmas Day win as the Los Angeles Lakers beat the Golden State Warriors.
articles.title: LeBron James sets NBA Christmas Day record in Los Angeles Lakers win

articles.description: Patrick Mahomes steered the Kansas City Chiefs to the AFC top seed, Lamar Jackson enhanced his MVP claims and Beyonce wowed on Christmas Day in the NFL.
articles.title: NFL results & Christmas Day reports: Chiefs' Mahomes, Ravens' Jackson & Beyonce all star

articles.description: Simona Halep withdraws from Australian Open qualifying and will delay the start of her 2025 season after feeling pain in her knee and shoulder.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Simona Halep withdraws from qualifying because of injury
